header: A container made to swipe eon-slid

properties.description: Quick access to the swiper structure nodes references
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: Slide which the view is focused on
properties.name: currentSlide

properties.description: Slides direction movement         Values: horizontal, vertical         Default: horizontal
properties.name: direction

properties.description: Nodes not allowed to act as sliders
properties.name: excludedSliders

properties.description: Denied slide by touching         Values: false, true         Default: false
properties.name: externalSlide

properties.description: Whether or not the swiper should have full screen mode         Values: false, true         Default: false
properties.name: fullScreen

properties.description: Whether or not navigation buttons should be displayed         Values: false, true         Default: false
properties.name: navigation

properties.description: Pagination type         Values: filled, hideable, hidden         Default: filled
properties.name: pagination

properties.description: Quick access to the thumbnails container node
properties.name: pagingNode

properties.description: Slide translate pixels amount for each pixel move by the mouse         Default: 1
properties.name: slideDistance

properties.description: Slides nodes and their translate ranges
properties.name: slides

properties.description: Translate pixels amount for each pixel move by the mouse on pagination node         Default: 2
properties.name: thumbnailDistance

properties.description: Thumbnails nodes and their translate ranges
properties.name: thumbnails

properties.description: Swiper type         Values: slider, gallery         Default: slider
properties.name: type

methods.description: Select thumbnail related to the current slide selected

methods.description: Format array property
methods.name: _formatArrayProperty

methods.description: Get element computed style float property value
methods.name: _getNumProperty

methods.name: _getValueAsArray

params.description: Array or String value to be processed
params.name: value

methods.name: _isEdgeElement

params.description: Array or String value to be processed
params.name: value

return.description: Whether or not the system is running on a non standard behavior browser

methods.description: Called when the element is resized, keeps the current slide in its corresponding position
methods.name: _keepInPlace

methods.description: Navigation controller click functionality
methods.name: _navClick

methods.description: Hideable pagination animation
methods.name: _paginationHideAnim
